function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of insufficient social distancing measures leading to potential virus spread","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission within the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement strict occupancy limits, real-time monitoring, and automated alerts for overcrowded areas","Technologies":"Motion sensors, occupancy sensors, LIDAR, radar","People":"Visitors, office occupants","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"},{"Description":"Risk of ineffective disinfection and cleaning leading to virus spread","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to contaminated indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Deploy robots for efficient and effective disinfection, use of ultraviolet germicidal irradiation, and real-time sensor data for identifying high-risk areas","Technologies":"Disinfection robots, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation, LIDAR, radar, occupancy sensors","People":"Cleaning staff, visitors, office occupants","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, cleaning companies"},{"Description":"Risk of misidentification of high-risk areas for disinfection","Impact":"Failure to effectively target and disinfect areas with high virus transmission risk","Mitigation":"Utilize real-time sensor data and AI algorithms to accurately identify high-traffic areas and surfaces with elevated contamination, and deploy disinfection robots accordingly","Technologies":"AI algorithms, sensor data analysis, disinfection robots, LIDAR, radar","People":"Cleaning staff, visitors, office occupants","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"}]}
